downloadTitle: Microsoft® SQL Server® 2016 RC3 PowerPivot® for Microsoft SharePoint® 2016
downloadDescription: Microsoft SQL Server 2016  PowerPivot for SharePoint 2016 extends SharePoint Server 2016 to add server-side data refresh processing, collaboration, and management support for PowerPivot workbooks.
detailsSection: Microsoft SQL Server 2016 PowerPivot for SharePoint 2013 extends SharePoint Server 2016 to add server-side data refresh processing, collaboration, and management support for PowerPivot workbooks and Excel workbooks with advanced data models to SharePoint. This package is only available in a 64-bit version.
systemRequirementsSection:
• See Hardware and software requirements for SharePoint
  • The computer must have the following installed: Microsoft SharePoint Server 2016.
installInstructionSection:
To install and use Microsoft SQL Server 2016 PowerPivot for Microsoft SharePoint, complete the following steps in this order:

  1. Run SpPowerPivot16.msi.
  2. Click Next on the Welcome page.
  3. Review and accept the license agreement, then click Next.
  4. On the Feature Selection page, all of the features are selected by default.
  5. Click Next.
  6. Click Install to install to finish the installation.
    7. For more information on installation, see, Install or Uninstall the PowerPivot for SharePoint Add-in.
additionalInformationSection: Your feedback is important. Help improve SQL Server 2016 by submitting bugs to Microsoft® Connect.
